attributes.action: Bring the Applications for Heavy Goods Vehicle Licences into line with Ordinary Planning Applications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The law limits Objections only to: "Owners of land or property directly affected by the Application. This means: Application for such H.G.V. Apps can be within Conservation Areas, A.O.N.B's or S.S.S.I's & also Listed Buildings. Thus, we cannot, directly, object to the Traffic Commissioners (for the Area). This is wrong. Our Objections must be allowed - to the Police and Local Authority for the Area as well as the Traffic Commissioners, and be given the same weight.
Public Notices, in the Local Press must clearly show that ALL may comment and not just a very few "interested persons."
